description: CALLHOME American English corpus - conversational telephone speech for speaker diarization

source.name: CALLHOME American English Speech
source.citation: CALLHOME American English Speech, Linguistic Data Consortium, 1997

license.name: LDC User Agreement for Non-Members
license.notes: Commercial license required. Academic use may require institutional LDC membership.

download.notes: CALLHOME requires LDC membership or purchase. Not freely downloadable.

audio_format.notes: Original format is NIST SPHERE. Convert to WAV for processing.

annotation_format.notes: Reference RTTM derived from CALLHOME transcriptions with speaker labels

sample_discovery.notes: Call IDs listed in splits file. Audio and RTTM follow naming convention.

meta.notes: Telephone conversations between family members or friends. 8kHz narrowband audio. Standard diarization benchmark alongside AMI.
